review: A really nice and friendly doctor... He was accomodating with our request, charged us appropriately and explained everything really well...

He’s extremely helpful. He listens to your problem in detail. After that he suggests the right kind of tests to make sure his guess is correct. Then only he suggests medication based on your disease. Also, he’s highly responsive and reachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for kidney stones treatment, when i visit ,i am in extreme pain he responded quickly and gave injection for pain for instant relief than give medication for 10 days and the treatment goes well and i am feeling good now.Doctor Samvaad is friendly and highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Frankly it was a wild choice....first got postponed due to preoccupation of the doctor. But when he came on line, it was miracle that followed. My old mother was comfortable with discussing her problems and the Dr had all the patience to listen to her and my interjunctions too.
In all a wonderful  experience. 
Thank you Dr Shetty.

I have booked appointment with Dr. Samvaad and visited the clinic. Doctor was friendly and polite with me. He had done my check up and I did not face any issue in my appointment like long waiting time, staff were well trained all the things were prefect. It was small and neat clinic so I would like to recommend this doctor for friends and family members also
Very friendly and prescribed well,he attended us early because my wife was not feeling ok and her bp was very low.kind doctor and intelligent
**** **** ******* Immediately addressed the issue with less pain and gave details on the post treatment
Friendly doctor. **** ************** Patiently explained everything. Overall, I'm satisfied with the visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great guy. Very friendly and patient plus knowledgeable too. Makes the patient comfortable and ask open ended to know the problem better. All five stars to him

Hi Dr,

Thanks for your treatment of allergy for my mom, she got relief from day one , on third day symptoms are almost gone

Thanks you!

Regards,
Shyam
